name: Last Outpost 100H
description:
Last Outpost

As one of the sole survivors of a zombie apocalypse the outpost is the last bastion of humanity.

Fight your way through 5 different enemy types with 22 different weapons.

Gather money and resources to upgrade your outpost and arsenal.

Attract more survivors as you grow your outpost.

This project was made to see how much I could accomplish in 100 hours of work.

Any and all feedback would be much appreciated.

Depending on feedback this project may continue or be converted into a Rougelike.

Some bugs are likely still present.

Created with Gamemaker Studio 2 and Aseprite.

Thanks for Playing!
